column5: Hi There,  When is the sale event for fishing stuff at BassPro store? What dates? I am a tackle junk colector. Is time to broad my colection.  Regards,
I thought stuff went on sale when the fishing show was in town...
just saw this ad in the new ood mag delivered today
it is all on their site usually    .......  http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/s...eptId=000000000
Or you could just phone them and get all the info you need........905-761-4000
and dont forget that the float suit is a miss print it is NOT $174
Can you use gift cards at the sale?
Thank you guys. March Classic Sale scheduled from: 12 March to 28 March. BassPro, Vaughn, GTA
